thag4.6:1.1: It was so welcome for me
thag4.6:2.1: He was glorious, the teacher of a community,
thag4.6:2.2: a leader who had realized the highest.
thag4.6:2.3: In all the world with its gods,
thag4.6:2.4: he was the victor of unequaled vision.
thag4.6:3.1: A great giant, a great hero,
thag4.6:3.2: a great light free of defilement.
thag4.6:3.3: With the utter ending of all defilements,
thag4.6:3.4: the teacher fears nothing from any quarter.
thag4.6:4.1: For a long time, sadly, I was corrupted,
thag4.6:4.2: fettered by the bond of wrong view.
